root.name: Army Men: Green Rogue
root.description: Plot: You assume the role of the Omega Soldier, a genetically modified super soldier that is composed of the DNA of the Bravo company commandos. When the Omega Soldier is being transferred from the science facility by helicopter to a training facility, the chopper is ambushed by two Tan choppers, causing the chopper to crash, killing everybody aboard except for the Omega Soldier. Shot down and left for dead behind enemy lines, it's up to him to stop the Tan Army.Gameplay: The gameplay differs slightly from previous additions to series by entering the vein of a more arcade-like shooter.Release DatesPlayStation 2: March 20, 2001PlayStation: February 2, 2005
